prompt:
Extract contents related to the topics Mitigation, Alleviation, Reduction, Minimization, Therapy, Intervention, Remediation, Healing, Treatment, Cure, Remedy in Gaucher Disease using the only Input.
Do not include your assumption.
response: The carrier frequency of pathogenic variants (PV) and likely pathogenic variants (LPV) in the GBA gene causing Gaucher disease is 1.6% (27/1642). The most common variants are c.605G > A (p.Arg202Gln) and c.1448 T > C (p.Leu483Pro). These variants have frequencies of 0.54% (9/1642) and 0.42% (7/1642), respectively.
